description: This file defines the 'GateController' class, which provides REST API endpoints for managing airport gates such as creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting gates.

classes.name: GateController
classes.description: REST controller for managing airport gates with endpoints for create, read, update, delete and list operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new gate, enforcing unique gateCode.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a gate by its UUID.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all gates.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to fully update an existing gate.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a gate by its UUID.
